title: GAME CLIENT CRASHES AND I LOST MY LOOT ELIGIBILITY
body:
RIOT can you please do something about this? my game crashed after playing 2 straight games with no issues. When I tried to run the 3rd game, my game wouldn't load. I had to reboot my computer after multiple attempts, and I was able to go into the game. Upon entering the game, my team voted to remake which is totally fine. I understand

At the end game lobby it stated, "You are ineligible to earn loot due to leaving or AFK behaviors" Bruh i never AFK or Left any game this season. I even lost 20 LP for something r%%%%%ed that I didn't do. FIX THIS S**T RIOT

replies.body:
>At the end game lobby it stated, "You are ineligible to earn loot due to leaving or AFK behaviors

If doesnt effect season rewards or other games

Just to confirm, I will still get my honor loot / end of the season reward? because this is tilting me IRL. Makes me wanna uninstall the game right now for losing something i grinded so hard for. I started bronze 3 and got to gold 3, I got really heated when i saw this message
You will still get honor loot and end of season rewards yes.
Unless you lost honor/got a restriction, you are fine. That is just the anti-botting/afk system restricting one game.
